title: health check endpoint returns system status
description: Verify that the /health GET endpoint returns a 200 status code indicating the system is healthy.

title: user registration with valid data
description: Test the /auth/register POST endpoint with valid email, password, and username to ensure user is created successfully and returns 201 status.

title: user login returns jwt tokens
description: Test the /auth/login POST endpoint with valid credentials to verify it returns access_token and refresh_token with 200 status.

title: two factor authentication setup and verification
description: Verify the /2fa/setup POST endpoint returns a QR code and secret for 2FA setup, and /2fa/verify POST endpoint correctly verifies a valid TOTP code.

title: account api keys configuration and balance retrieval
description: Test /account/keys POST endpoint to save exchange API keys and /account/balance GET endpoint to retrieve user balance, including error when keys are not configured.

title: bot start stop and status endpoints
description: Verify /bot/start POST starts a trading bot with given parameters, /bot/stop POST stops the bot and closes positions, and /bot/status GET returns current bot running status.

title: grid bot creation and control
description: Test /grid-bot POST to create a grid bot with parameters, /grid-bot/{bot_id}/start POST to start the grid bot, and /grid-bot/{bot_id}/stop POST to stop the grid bot.

title: order submission and position closing
description: Verify /order/submit POST accepts valid order parameters and submits order, and /order/close/{position_id} POST closes the specified position.

title: positions retrieval endpoint
description: Test /positions GET endpoint returns a list of all open positions for the authenticated user.

title: market chart candle data retrieval
description: Verify /chart/candles/{symbol} GET endpoint returns candle data for the specified symbol and interval query parameter.
